title: Shreeman v/s Shreemati
overview: Justice Amal Chowdhury, infamous for never granting divorces, throws a bickering couple, Sourav and Amrita, a curveball: a quirky role-reversal challenge to save their crumbling marriage. But things take an unexpected turn when Sourav learns the judge himself has been stuck in India's longest-running divorce case 27 years with his estranged wife, Aparna. What follows is a hilarious and heartfelt journey as Sourav teams up with Justice Chowdhury to reunite the old flames. Can their offbeat plan bring back lost love? This feel-good story blends laughter, love, and second chances in the most unexpected ways.
